ComicInfo.Penciller: Bob Brown,Dick Dillin,Jerry Grandenetti,Jim Mooney,Nick Cardy,Bob Brown,Jim Mooney,Dick Dillin,Nick Cardy,Jerry Grandenetti
ComicInfo.Summary:
Run for Your Death: Lance wants to join a hunting club but ends up being the hunted, not the hunter.
The Beast of Bristol: English horror actor Elliot Smathers fears to lose his mind. Is he really going on nightly killing sprees in his sleep? Or is it a scheme of his agent to drive him insane?
If Time Runs Out!: Ian Cheevers steals a cursed clock, if it stops so will his life.
We Cruised into the Supernatural!: A sorceror named Maki offers a group of adventurers a voyage into the supernatural.
The Upside Down World of Harry Updyke: Harry believes that when he sleeps, his dreams reveal to him the real world, while the waking world is just a dream.
ComicInfo.Writer: Carl Wessler,George Kashdan,Murray Boltinoff,Bill Dennehy,George Kashdan,Carl Wessler,Bill Dennehy
